amendment.description: To clarify certain payment limitations applicable to certain payments under title I of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 and section 1101 of the Agricultural Reconciliation Act of 2005 and to partially restore funding to programs reduced by section 1101, 1201, and 1202 of the Agricultural Reconciliation Act of 2005.

action.text: Amendment SA 2359 proposed by Senator Grassley.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2359.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2359 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 290.
Amendment SA 2359 ruled out of order by the chair.
